prompts: Create a cat-like Pokemon with fiery fur and glowing yellow eyes.
Show me a sleek, orange Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire.
Imagine a playful feline Pokemon that loves to chase flames.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a cute kitten into a fierce fire beast.
Generate an energetic fire-type Pokemon with distinct black stripes and a bold personality.
Make a powerful Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a fiery combat style.
Give me a Pokemon that can leap high and has a fiery tail for attacks.
